name: Magic Fleet
description:
Join the Magic Fleet™! Work for a magical moving company and help furnish our clients' homes! In this game you can change yourself to any type of furniture the client wants. But be sure to place yourself in the correct position or... something weird might happen. Permanent furniture form of employees will be considered a violation of our code of conduct and will result in the immediate termination of the work contract

This game was made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam #25.
